data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Salzburg prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Salzburg, Austria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 3,038 believers in Salzburg and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Salzburg that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Salzburg, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, German-speaking people. Make the Jew, German-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Salzburg. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Salzburg, Austria who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Salzburg, Austria has a population of 533,100.

We estimate Salzburg has 3,038 people who might know Jesus, 358,010 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 172,052 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 175 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Salzburg to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
